thread.title: Maitre'D by Posera Certifies BIXOLON mPOS Printers
thread.title_full: Maitre'D by Posera Certifies BIXOLON mPOS Printers

author: John Choi
title: Maitre'D by Posera Certifies BIXOLON mPOS Printers
text:
BIXOLON America is pleased to announce they are now certified with Maitre'D POS! Maitre‘D POS restaurant software that “offers everything you would ever need to manage your business, from point-of-sale for any type of operation, to complete back-office reporting, Maitre’D offers the latest enterprise solutions for any restaurant or food-service environment.” John Choi, Product Manager at BIXOLON America said, “The BIXOLON SRP-350plusIIICOSG, SRP-275IICEPG, SRP-F310COSG, and SPP-R300BK POS printers are really the building blocks of the BIXOLON mPOS line of thermal printers. With drop in paper loading, they are faster and quieter than the competition and with bidirectional print technology our printer has higher operational reliability.” Mr. Choi added that, “We are extremely excited to have another certification, especially with a company like Maitre’D.”
Shannon Arnold, Marketing Director at Maitre’D POS said that, “Return on investment from our POS software solutions are built on the premise of helping our customers make more money. Since IT investments are all about the ROI, we focus on adding features that ultimately benefit our customer’s bottom line.” Ms. Arnold continued on to say that, “With over 20,000 customers worldwide, we look to BIXOLON to help us continue the dependability that Maitre’D offers to our client base.”
About BIXOLON
BIXOLON is a leading global manufacturer of dependable and innovative advanced printing and mobile technologies that include POS receipt, desktop label, and mobile portable printers for the retail, hospitality, healthcare, and warehousing industries. We view our printing technology as an essential tool for any business, and hold ourselves to the highest standards since dedication to our customers is our core belief. Visit http://www.bixolonusa.com for more information.
About Posera-HDX Ltd.
Founded in 1999, Posera -HDX Ltd. offers a robust and easily customizable restaurant and food-service POS system in Maitre’D POS. This solution is a particularly great fit for businesses within the hospitality industry seeking a system with more sophisticated controls, as well as the ability to accurately analyze profits and run reports. Maitre’D POS is a great fit for all kinds of food-service operations, from fine dining restaurants, to quick service cafes. The system currently boasts over 20,000 customers worldwide, and is completely PCI and EMV compliant. Maitre’D POS can be adapted for food-service retailers of any size, from small cafes to large franchises. To learn more, visit http://www.maitredpos.com/
